matador.business_logic

Class MatadorRafleBaeger

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador.business_logic.MatadorRafleBaeger

  • public class MatadorRafleBaeger
extends Object
    Provides a MatadorRafleBaeger containing either two or a custom number of pseudo random six-sided dice. Provides necessary methods to support the Game class.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    Die

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatadorRafleBaeger()
      Constructor that creates two Die instances.
      MatadorRafleBaeger(int numDice)
      Creates a MatadorRafleBaeger with numDice Die instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getEns()
      Returns whether or all the Die instances have the same facevalue.
      int[] getFacevalues()
      Returns the facevalue of all the Die instances in the MatadorRafleBaeger contained in an Array of int.
      int getSum()
      Returns the sum of the facevalues of all the Die instances.
      void rollDice()
      Rolls all Die instances contained in this MatadorRafleBaeger.
      String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatadorRafleBaeger

        public MatadorRafleBaeger()
        Constructor that creates two Die instances.

      • MatadorRafleBaeger

        public MatadorRafleBaeger(int numDice)
        Creates a MatadorRafleBaeger with numDice Die instances. The Die instances will initially be given random values.
        Parameters:
        numDice - required number of Die instances as an int.

    • Method Detail

      • getEns

        public boolean getEns()
        Returns whether or all the Die instances have the same facevalue.
        Returns:
        true if all the Die instances have the same facevalue.

      • getSum

        public int getSum()
        Returns the sum of the facevalues of all the Die instances.
        Returns:
        int with the sum of all Die instances facevalues.

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        Rolls all Die instances contained in this MatadorRafleBaeger.

      • getFacevalues

        public int[] getFacevalues()
        Returns the facevalue of all the Die instances in the MatadorRafleBaeger contained in an Array of int. The facevalues are ordered the same way as the original Die instances in dice.
        Returns:
        Array of ints with the facevalue of all Die instances in the MatadorRafleBaeger.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
